remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为， `true` 使得单个单元格为只读。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 将 属性设置为， `true` 使单个列中的所有单元格成为只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 将 属性设置为 `true` 以使所有单元格在只读状态下， 如果在 、列和单元格级别的设置之间存在冲突，则的值 `true` 优先于值 `false` 。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the , column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将键盘输入传递到 包含该单元格的。This method passes keyboard input to the that contains the cell. 每个列处理输入的方式适合于列类型。Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.

Protected Overridable Sub OnSelected (e As RoutedEventArgs)
abstract member OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
